name: Oblivion (Suhad)
description:
Trapped between worlds, help Jack to wake up from his endless dreams. 

A survival horror game jam submission made for [DevSquad Academy Jam] in 2021. Where I worked with [The Dark Elements] team and I was responsible about the main story, UI and level design. 

Please note: Due to time constraints while participating in the jam I was not able to build a Windows 64 bit version, but my team mates [Musehive] uploaded the game with Mac version, feel free to check it here please.  Also we were not able to add AI and other levels.

I decided to upload the  Windows 64 bit version now and keep it as it was , which is a prototype.  So the game currently just has the level design and audio in it. If you want, you can have a go at it to explore.
